description.text: On this advertisement calendar of the Burmah oil company, several beautifully ornamented elephants can be seen on the upper section of the image as well as a bird in the central section. Two bearers are carrying a sedan that used to host the leaflets with the daily dates on it.

inscription.text: The Burmah Oil Company Limited Glasgow London Rangoon
Manufacturers of Burning Lubricant Batching Fuel and Cylinder Oils Crease Candles Paraffin Wax Petrol Etc. Refiners at Dunneedaw Syriam Bogyok & Yenengyat

Purveyors of Motor Spirit to H.M. the King Emperor Finest Mineral Wax & Stearine Candle By Special Appointment Managing Agents Finlay Fleming & Co. Rangoon Burmah lubricating oils in many grades to suit all types of machinery Burmah Kerosene Oils Brands Waterfly - Oriental - Mosque - Firefly - Victoria - Lakshmi - Gold Mohur - Hemaz - Bottle. Sowar - Mahadeo - Kingshead Indian Agents Shaw Wallace & Co. Calcutta - Madras - Bombay - KarachiBullock Pros. Co. Ltd. [...][not readable due to damage]

description-en: On this advertisement calendar of the Burmah oil company, several beautifully ornamented elephants can be seen on the upper section of the image as well as a bird in the central section. Two bearers are carrying a sedan that used to host the leaflets with the daily dates on it. (gs)

explanatory comments/crosstagging: The visual narratives of royalness incorporated with the sedan-carriers and the ornamented elephants might be serving as a reminder for the consumer, that the Burmah Oil company is a supplier of the king and his palace. (gs)

The visual narratives of royalness incorporated with the sedan-carriers and the ornamented elephants might be serving as a reminder for the consumer, that the Burmah Oil company is a supplier of the king and his palace.
